nodes.text: Salporin was a Wookiee warrior who fought in the Battle of Kashyyyk. The wookiee wore armor upon the head and on the shoulders.

Salporin was originally created by author Timothy Zahn for his 1991 Star Wars Legends novel Heir to the Empire. Later, the official StarWars.com original Databank retconned Salporin to be one of the Wookiees seen fighting in Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. Portrayed by David Stiff in a Wookiee suit, his movements were used as a model for several digitally created Wookiees featured in the movie.
Salporin appears as a CPU during multiplayer AI matches in Star Wars Battlefront II as a Wookiee reinforcement for the Galactic Republic and Rebel Alliance.
